Text:
Picture quality is ok but definition would be much better with ZEKTORM or FLAWL3SS. I hope they're going to release this soon.
About the english subtitles they're for deaf people so you have to find normal ones somewhere else.

http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/subtitles/4481696/the-girl-with-the-dragon-tattoo-en

you can use these subtitles instead, timings are identical
CINAVIA PROTECTED... for all you PS3 users.
Thanx for the share. If I don't comment again then the quality is good.
